select sum(o.Count) OrderSheepCount,max(o.State) OrderState,p.Id,p.VendorId,p.Title,p.Type,p.BeginTime,p.EffectiveTime,p.RedemTime,p.Period from SheepOrder o inner join SheepProject p on (o.ProjectId=p.Id) where o.CustomerId=#{customerId} and o.State in
#{item}
and (p.Type='03' or p.Type='04')
and (p.Type<>'03' and p.Type<>'04')
and o.Deleted=false and o.Frozened=false and p.Deleted=false group by p.Id order by o.Id desc
